casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2005-0107. State v. Murrin.

Cuyahoga App. No. 83482, 2004-Ohio-6301. Discretionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decisions in 2004-1771, State v. Quinones, Cuyahoga App. No. 83720, 2004-Ohio-4485, and 2004-1568, State v. Foster, Licking App. No. 03CA95, 2004-Ohio-4209; and briefing schedule stayed.

Moyer, C.J., would accept and hold the cause on Proposition of Law I only.
